name: Kitty in the Box
description:
Some kitties are born ready to slide into boxes, but others need your help to learn how. Stare down challenging boxes atop a magical path of cakes, but don’t get too excited or they will go over the edge. Download now to begin a flavorful journey with your favorite kitty!

Awesome features
Easy to pick up, but hard to put down
Complete challenges to unlock your favorite kitty
Share acrobatic videos with your friends
Dress up your kitties in style
